item.title: LEGION: Learning to Ground and Explain for Synthetic Image Detection
item.description: LEGION: Grounding and explaining synthetic image detection and refinement via multimodal learning.

item.description: ADC: Human-robot collaboration revolutionizes data collection, slashing data needs and boosting robot learning!

item.title: Mask-DPO: Generalizable Fine-grained Factuality Alignment of LLMs
item.description: Mask-DPO: Fine-grained Factuality Alignment improves LLMs’ factuality by masking sentence-level errors during DPO training for enhanced knowledge alignment.

item.title: Q-Eval-100K: Evaluating Visual Quality and Alignment Level for Text-to-Vision Content
item.description: Q-Eval-100K: A new, large dataset for evaluating visual quality and text alignment in AI-generated content.

item.title: SIFT: Grounding LLM Reasoning in Contexts via Stickers
item.description: SIFT: Grounds LLM reasoning with ‘Stickers’ to highlight context and improve accuracy without extra training.
